title: Srimad Bhagavad-gita - Chapter 10 Recitation | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | ISKCON Bangalore Sanga
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.key_quote: dadhāmi buddhi yogam tam yena mām upayanti te
segments.summary: The speaker recites verses from the Bhagavad Gita, Chapter 10, focusing on the opulence of the Absolute Self and the path to reach Him.
The speaker continues reciting verses, including Arjuna's inquiry about Krishna's divine opulences and Krishna's promise to reveal them.
Krishna begins to describe His opulences, identifying Himself as the source and essence of various aspects of creation.
The recitation continues with Krishna elaborating on His presence in different forms and concluding that only a fragment of His power sustains the universe.
